skills.description: Make no noise, until they attack. Immune to effects that affect living creatures (e.g. poison). Immune to mind-affecting or mind-reading spells (e.g. charm, hold, sleep).
skills.name: Undead

skills.description: Can only be harmed by magical attacks.
skills.name: Mundane damage immunity

skills.description: A successfully touched target permanently loses two experience levels (or Hit Dice). This incurs a loss of two Hit Dice of hit points, as well as all other benefits due to the drained levels (e.g. spells, saving throws, etc.). A character’s XP is reduced to the lowest amount for the new level. A person drained of all levels becomes a vampire in 3 days.
skills.name: Energy drain

skills.description: Save versus spells at –2 or be charmed: move towards the vampire (resisting those who try to prevent it); defend the vampire; obey the vampire’s commands (if understood); unable to cast spells or use magic items; unable to harm the vampire. Killing the vampire breaks the charm.
skills.name: Charming gaze

skills.description: A damaged vampire gains 3hp at the start of each round, as long as it is alive.
skills.name: Regeneration

skills.description: Change into gaseous form; flee to coffin.
skills.name: At 0hp

skills.description:
At will; takes 1 round:

- **Humanoid: Standard form.**
- **Dire wolf:** Att 1 × bite (2d4), MV 150’ (50’). AC, HD, morale, saves as vampire.
- **Giant bat:** Att 1 × bite (1d4), MV 30’ (10’) / 180’ (60’) flying. AC, HD, morale, saves as vampire.
- **Gaseous cloud:** MV 180’ (60’) flying. Immune to all weapons. Cannot attack.
skills.name: Change form

skills.description: In human form only. Creatures from the surrounding area: 1d10 × 10 rats, 5d4 giant rats, 1d10 × 10 bats, 3d6 giant bats, 3d6 wolves, or 2d4 dire wolves.
skills.name: Summon beasts

skills.description: Must rest in a coffin during the day or lose 2d6hp (only regenerated by resting a full day). Cannot rest in a blessed coffin. Always keep multiple coffins in hidden locations.
skills.name: Coffins

skills.description:
- **Garlic:** Odour repels: save vs poison or unable to attack this round.
- **Holy symbols:** If presented, will keep a vampire at bay (10’). May attack wielder from another direction.
- **Running water:** Cannot cross (in any form), except by a bridge or carried inside a coffin.
- **Mirrors:** Avoid; do not cast a reflection.
- **Continual light:** Partly blinded by the light from this spell (–4 to attacks).
skills.name: Vulnerabilities

skills.description:
- **Sunlight:** Save versus death each round or be disintegrated.
- **Stake through the heart:** Permanently kills.
- **Immersion in water:** For 1 turn permanently kills.
- **Destroying coffins:** Permanently killed if all hit points lost when unable to rest (see coffins).
skills.name: Destroying
